website_summaries.verdict: Hawaiian volcanic water is known for its natural alkalinity and clean flavor, and Waiakea is an environmentally responsible company with a strong reputation in the industry.
pros: Available in many retail and convenience store outlets
Company donates portion of sales to "clean water" programs
Clean and crisp flavor profile is very satisfying
cons: Water source may be Hawaiian municipal tap water
pH test results vary widely, as low as 4.0 (acidic)

customer_reviews.title: NOT alkaline...my tap water is more alkaline.
customer_reviews.text: I have tested the pH of two bottles. My tap water is 7.0 and Waiakea ‘alkaline’ water has a pH of 6.5. I am pretty POd and will be requesting a refund. I have been ripped off and will not be purchasing this again. This doesn’t even account for the fact that the manufacturer packed a box of 24 with 22 bottles. This is a scam I DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.JWB

customer_reviews.title: Tap water
customer_reviews.text: Waiakea, according to the CEO or founder, is actually drawn from the municipal water supply system (tap water) from the the big island. Then flown to Los Angeles to be packaged. You can easily google this info. So before paying $30-$40 for 12 bottles of water, FYI
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware smh
customer_reviews.text: This water is a fake. It’s not the real Waikea water. I’ve noticed that it has a different top meaning it was refilled and retopped. I can’t believe my eyes. I love this water. The real waikea water has a star on the top, not some numbers and a recycle symbol.
customer_reviews.author: David Manley

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this water...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this water, I really did. I however felt exhausted and lethargic after drinking it. It is almost easier to describe this water as thick. It really did not feel refreshing and certainly was not worth the price. I will be going back to Icelandic Glacial. This water may be preferred by others, but certainly not by me.
customer_reviews.author: tydawg

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE BE DO NOT ROUGH HANDLE. BOTTLES LEAK AND WEAKEN PACKING.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottled water, but I have one request. PLEASE RING WHEN DELIVERED. I am disabled, and it's difficult for me to get it in the front door...PLEASE DO NOT ROUGH HANDLE CARTON. BOTTLES LEAKED AND I DON'T LIIKE GETTING 1/2 BOTTLES OF WATER. PLEASE RESPOND... THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and good ph
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a replacement for Fiji water due to my questioning the Fiji company's moral standards. I found this water, tried it, and researched it's background. I am very pleased with the quality of the water and the moral values of the Waiakea company. I will be buying this water from now on
customer_reviews.author: Kelda Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Honestly better than any gas station bottle of water.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I got conned by Zac Efron and his new Netflix series that mineral water is better. Did a little research to find the best mineral water to try and that was available to me in the US. I attached the graphic I used for the decision making. It was worth it! Buying by the case makes this reasonable priced. If you are interested and have the $30ish to try it out - I highly recommend! I still use my Brita A LOT, but this is my go to bottle when I am really feeling dehydrated. Bottle is also certified carbon neutral!
customer_reviews.author: Mdmed11

customer_reviews.title: This water is very good
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think there could be a different taste in bottled water. But this water taste do fresh and clean. I love it. I wish I could find it on the east coast. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Malone

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really pay attention to the price when I bought this. It's like over $30 for a 24 pack of water, and it's only half a liter bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M. Heeter

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did it once
customer_reviews.text: Water was great, although didnt seem different than some local bottled brands. The bottle though is beautiful and makes you wants to drink more water! It also just feels nice to have something from that area but dont want to make my FedEx guy carry that heavy box again.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This water is great! It has a very smooth taste even at room temperature. No mineral notes nor the typical plastic bottle taste when it’s hot. I would say this is better than Fiji water.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: SO TASTY AND SMOOTH
customer_reviews.text: Th only water me and my four kids all love. They call it the most water tasting water they ever had. It’s super smooth and I find myself drinking more water because of this water. For me and mine it’s amazing in taste the price is a little high but to me it’s worth it. Love that it’s rPET bottles
customer_reviews.author: MommyX4

customer_reviews.title: Gifted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a gift. She’s a water snob. She prefers distilled waters over spring so I was happy to hear it didn’t have a musky spring taste. Plus it’s from Hawaii. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: layah

customer_reviews.title: Love this water
customer_reviews.text: This water tastes crisp and light to me. Top of my list other than mountain valley springs and fiji.. Had an issue with the delivery but the seller handled it so swiftly, I actually can’t believe it and gave me the authentic water! I’ll get a case biweekly.
customer_reviews.author: Datrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second box of Waiakea water that I have purchased that has flaws/holes in the bottles themselves where they leak or they have loose caps. I will no longer purchase this water. Very poor quality control. The water is very good in the bottles that had no problems. But not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: sarah parker

customer_reviews.title: Garbage bag full of water bottles
customer_reviews.text: I like the water and I've ordered it 3 or 4 times in the past and had no complaints. For some reason, this time, the water arrived thrown in a plastic trash bag instead of in the normal box. I don't like paying full price for a product that isn't in its original box. Not going to send it back but probably won't order again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie P.

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: This water may be a bit pricey...but it is delicious!!!! I’m kind of a water junkie and try all sorts of different water. This one is by far my favorite. I can only imagine this water tastes like the clouds of heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Ry C

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bottled water.
customer_reviews.text: This is a our absolute favorite bottled water and we splurge on it every once in a while. The price is pretty average for other places we've bought it. The bottles are GREAT quality and can be reused over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: PH was 6.0 upon recipt
customer_reviews.text: I try to look for more alkaline water and I decided to try this brand. Upon receipt I tasted and tested ith a litmus test strip and it registered 6.0-6.25, far from 7.6-8.2 as described. Considering the cost, it is now worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stone

customer_reviews.title: The Worlds Best Water!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite water and my family loves it we usually get it by the bottle at the store so I decided to find it by the case and I am not disappointed 10/10 would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: Reality is, that this water tastes exactly like tap water. I was really expecting something different, but to be honest this is the biggest load of crap. Save your money! Or get Icelandic Glacial Water if you are going to be spending this kind of money.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great water. Just a tad spendy
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this water. I am very happy with it. Good taste and decent sized bottle with pretty blue design. Ill be buying this again. Just wish it was a little lower priced!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Best water I’ve ever tasted on the planet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This water is the best water ever!! I’ve tried all the waters that are out there and this is by far the best water ever!!!! I will define buying more. I’d you haven’t tried this water yet, you need to. It’s Awesometacular!!!
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Like the flavor and packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and feel much better drinking this water than generic brands from grocery stores. I have yet to test the pH of this water to make sure it is 7.6-8.2 as stated on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gulak

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting water ever
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best water I’ve ever tasted. Compared to regular store bought, this makes them seem as if they came from a garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: Nick I

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: Best water ever drank ! Not sure if it’s the bottle or the actual water but there is a defiant difference in the purity of taste. Defiantly worth trying and buying this product again !!!
customer_reviews.author: JKM 74

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT! Gotta have it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! It’s such a natural taste! I know some people might think water is water and they all taste the same. BUT i feel like every water has its own taste. My husband and i ENJOYED this water brand. Highly recommend. The price is a little too much but i promise it’s worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: I love the water
customer_reviews.text: I love the water. I love that the company is health and environmentally conscientious, and supports give water to those in need.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Thieman

customer_reviews.title: clean taste
customer_reviews.text: tastes really clean but a little pricey for water. Will see if it does anything for my body in the long run

customer_reviews.title: i love ordering this product
customer_reviews.text: i just love ordering this product . it doesn't take long from the time i order it until it arrives at my door . I am very pleased. I will order again as long as money will permit
customer_reviews.author: TOBY

customer_reviews.title: The bottles are very pretty, if that's a selling factor
customer_reviews.text: The water is fine. A bit overpriced, tho. Almost 30.00 for 15 bottles is a bit on the high end.
customer_reviews.author: Great-Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Good water. But pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water. Wish it wasn’t over $30 for a case. Probably will only buy it occasionally.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t what I expectef
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have tasted different but it didn’t . I don’t know why it didn’t like it.

customer_reviews.title: Hawaiian water
customer_reviews.text: This water is smooth and great to drink. No after taste and just plain refreshing.

customer_reviews.title: Great water
customer_reviews.text: I really love water and I think this is my favorite. Very fresh tasting without leaving any after taste or being too much.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste-easy to drink

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Overlook?
customer_reviews.text: The water delivered this week had a couple of bottles that were less than halfway filled with dried glue all over. This may have been a machine error during the assembly process. Hoping quality control will not suffer during these times as I have truly enjoyed this brand and have recommended it to many people.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bodybuilder and have auto immune illnesses. This helps me with my lifestyle tremendously

customer_reviews.title: Bottles Appear to be refilled and leaked
customer_reviews.text: These bottles leaked, not all are filled to the same level, and the bottle caps do not appear as the same as other bottles of this water I have purchased before at other locations. Very unhappy and will continue to buy my Fiji water I normally buy. Tastes like plastic.

customer_reviews.title: A nice fresh tasing water

customer_reviews.title: Delicious water
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this water on a lark but I found that it’s very tasty and clean has that Clean Chris taste

customer_reviews.title: This water is AMAZING! I have a son with Autism and he ...
customer_reviews.text: We actually received our order a day earlier than expected. This water is AMAZING! I have a son with Autism and he hates water. We have tried all types of Alkaline waters, filtered, and list goes on. This is the only water that he drinks now and loves it. He says it doesn't have any weird taste like other waters do. It is not only refreshing, but we are already seeing how it is helping both my son and I with our GI issues. I wish they sold it in the stores here in Reno, but we have no problem ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: A.will

customer_reviews.title: Empty bottle in package
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles came with a broken seal and empty

customer_reviews.text: Best drink in the world freshness like no other water

customer_reviews.title: Missing bottles
customer_reviews.text: The package came sealed but missing 6 bottles. This water is for a luxury limousine company. I don't understand how that could've happened.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive water
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good but honestly I can't tell the difference between it and My tap water. Tested the PH and it tested at a 6 rather than the 8 it claims. The packaging is attractive and I like that it's in recycled bottles and that the company donates their product to those in need via Pump Aid. If you don't mind paying a little extra for your water to help others- then I would buy this product again. I did have a shipping issue but the owner called me to get things cleared up and sent me a code for a discount on a future purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bsmbudy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome water👍👍👍👍👍 strongly recommend it . Just compare it to your Tap water..

customer_reviews.text: Love this water, not because of the Ph but just a great taste.

customer_reviews.title: It is not the real Walakea water.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a good tasting water. It taste like tap water.

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf Water, period!
customer_reviews.text: Cleanest water I have ever tasted. I call it TOP SHELF WATER, worth ever penny!!!

customer_reviews.title: Best water
customer_reviews.text: Best water ever I love it I’m on my 3rd order now

customer_reviews.title: tasted better. its ok but there is better tasting water
customer_reviews.text: tasted better. its ok but there is better tasting water.
customer_reviews.author: Robin9386

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Waiakea is the best water I have EVER tasted. I used to think that all bottled waters were the same, until I tried this one. Every time I open one, I am blown away by just how good this water is. If you are hesitant to buy this water because of the price, don't be. For every liter that you purchase, Waiakea donates 650 liters to people who don't have access to clean water. Plus, the water has a ton of health benefits, it comes from a sustainable source, the bottles are made from 100% recycled plastic, and the company is certified carbon neutral. You get what you pay for...and so do those in need.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love the water
customer_reviews.text: Love the water!! It is always delivered in a sturdy box unlike some others that get damaged during shipping. This water is worth the price and the wait!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS WATER
customer_reviews.text: The best water I've ever drank! Each time I go to the store or a different store, I check out the bottled water supply. I came across this brand at Sheetz and needed more in larger quantities immediately! I absolutely love this water and prefer it above any other bottled water. Fully refreshing with no unusual taste during or after drinking it. Very clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son just loved this water !!! It was great tasting ....
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Can't get much purer than this!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious healing naturally alkaline water! I have to try it again. I'm also drinking Hawaiian brand water. Trying to find out if one tastes better than the other. So far I think they pretty much have the same taste. I definitely recommend the Waiakea water!
customer_reviews.author: S. Pressman

customer_reviews.title: This water is good. I usually buy Icelandic
customer_reviews.text: This water is good. I usually buy Icelandic, but the price on Icelandic went up by about $10 a case. I am also trying Evian.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tescione

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I enjoyed it on the rocks without the gin
customer_reviews.text: People say water does not have flavor, they are wrong. My husband and I enjoyed it on the rocks without the gin.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: From The Snows of Mauna Loa
customer_reviews.text: This water is delicious and refreshing. It has a very soft mouth feel and is on the alkaline side, which is preferable, because acidity is conducive to inflammation in the body and inflammation is the cause of many ills.
customer_reviews.author: *watergatejim*

customer_reviews.title: Agony & the Ecstacy
customer_reviews.text: Best water I have ever tasted. Worst price I have ever paid. I only drink alkaline water. The shipping on this product is outrageous. Even on the company's website, the bulk options are insanely pricey. I emailed and tried to reason with them for loyal customers who drink a minimum of 3-4 liters per day. They told me they are working on it. Not good. Icelandic is my second favorite, and they are super nice to deal with. Excellent prices, too. If only Waiakea would offer their water at a better price point. Until then, enjoy this water if you can swing the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: warriormommy

product_meta.title: Waiakea Hawaiian Volcanic Water, Naturally Alkaline, 100% Recycled Bottle, 500mL (Pack of 24), 16.9 Fl Oz (Pack of 24)
product_meta.description: Size:16.9 Fl Oz (Pack of 24)Waiakea Hawaiian Water Hawaiian Volcanic . Healthy: Naturally alkaline - high ph - bpa free - rich in minerals and electrolytes for hydration. This product is manufactured in United States. Freezing and Chilling Temperature of the product is Ambient: Room Temperature.
feature_bullets: Sustainable: Certified carbon neutral - 100% recycled bottles (rpet) - sustainable source
Ethical: For every liter you buy, Waiakea donates 1 week of clean water to someone in need in Africa
NATURALLY ENHANCED: Waiakea Water is Naturally enhanced with minerals & electrolytes and provides the recommended daily value of Silica at just over 30 mg.
